document.full_text: the risk of radiation contamination from japan's damaged nuclear power stations has sparked food bans across the globe and more surprisingly, a buying frenzy from south korean mothers who fear their favorite japanese-made diapers may suddenly become unavailable.
document.title: japan radiation fear sparks south korea diaper rush
lines_and_colors: the risk of radiation contamination from japan's damaged nuclear power stations has sparked food bans across the globe and more surprisingly, a buying frenzy from south korean mothers who fear their favorite japanese-made diapers may suddenly become unavailable.
